inputs.name: PowerBIServiceEndpoint
inputs.label: Power BI service connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select a service connection that should be used to authenticate to Power BI.

inputs.name: Action
inputs.label: Action
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the action you would like to perform

options.AddUsers: Add a new user to an workspace

inputs.name: CrossWorkspaceRebinding
inputs.label: Cross workspace rebinding?
inputs.helpMarkDown: Will rebinding happen cross workspaces?

inputs.label: Skip report uploading?

inputs.name: WorkspaceName
inputs.label: Workspace name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the Power BI workspace. In case of the rebind report action this will be the dataset workspace.

inputs.label: Report workspace name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the power bi workspace where the report resides.

inputs.name: CapacityName

inputs.helpMarkDown: The name for the capacity.

inputs.label: Overwrite Power BI file

inputs.label: Create if the workspace does not exist

inputs.name: Users
inputs.label: Users (e-mail)
inputs.helpMarkDown: If you want to add multiple users seperate them with ','.

inputs.name: ServicePrincipals
inputs.label: Service principals (ClientID)
inputs.helpMarkDown: If you want to add multiple service principals seperate them with ','.

inputs.name: GroupObjectIds
inputs.label: Group object Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: If you want to add multiple groups separate the ids with ','.

inputs.name: Scope
inputs.label: Scope
inputs.helpMarkDown: Individual is used to access entities that belong to the current user. Organization is used to access entities across the entire company. Only Power BI tenant admins are allowed to use.

inputs.name: Permission
inputs.label: Permission
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specific permission: Admin, Member, Contributor or Viewer
inputs.visibleRule: Action = AddUsers || Action = AddSP || Action = AddGroup

inputs.label: Update all datasets in workspace the dataset name will be ignored
